7 CADToPointCloud::CADToPointCloud(const std::string& cad_path, const std::string& cad_file, PointCloudXYZ::Ptr cloud)
8 {
9  setPCpath(cad_path);
10 
11  if (CADToMesh(cad_path + cad_file) == 0) // here we get _CAD_mesh
12  {
13  if (MeshToPointCloud(_CAD_mesh) == 0) // here we get _CAD_cloud
14  {
15  pcl::copyPointCloud(*_CAD_cloud, *cloud);
16  ROS_INFO("File converted");
17  }
18  }
19 }

21 CADToPointCloud::CADToPointCloud(const std::string& cad_file_path, PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud)
22 {
23  ROS_INFO("Converting file: %s", cad_file_path.c_str());
24 
25  if (CADToMesh(cad_file_path) == 0) // here we get _CAD_mesh
26  {
27  if (MeshToPointCloud(_CAD_mesh) == 0) // here we get _CAD_cloud
28  {
29  pcl::copyPointCloud(*_CAD_cloud, *cloud);
30  ROS_INFO("File converted");
31  }
32  }
33 }

35 int CADToPointCloud::CADToMesh(const std::string& cad_file_path)
36 {
37  pcl::PolygonMesh mesh;
38  pcl::io::loadPolygonFile(cad_file_path, mesh);
39 
40  int len = mesh.cloud.row_step * mesh.cloud.height;
41  if (len == 0)
42  return -1;
43 
44  *_CAD_mesh = mesh;
45 
46  return 0;
47 }

49 int CADToPointCloud::MeshToPointCloud(pcl::PolygonMesh::Ptr mesh)
50 {
51  int SAMPLE_POINTS_ = 500000;
52  float leaf_size = 0.01f;
53 
54  vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> polydata1 = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData>::New();
55  pcl::io::mesh2vtk(*mesh, polydata1);
56 
57  // vtkSmartPointer<vtkOBJReader> readerQuery = vtkSmartPointer<vtkOBJReader>::New();
58  // readerQuery->SetFileName(inputfile.c_str());
59  // readerQuery->Update();
60  // polydata1 = readerQuery->GetOutput();
61 
62  // //make sure that the polygons are triangles!
63  // vtkSmartPointer<vtkTriangleFilter> triangleFilter = vtkSmartPointer<vtkTriangleFilter>::New();
64  // triangleFilter->SetInputData(polydata1);
65  // triangleFilter->Update();
66 
67  // vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataMapper> triangleMapper = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataMapper>::New();
68  // triangleMapper->SetInputConnection(triangleFilter->GetOutputPort());
69  // triangleMapper->Update();
70  // polydata1 = triangleMapper->GetInput();
71 
72  uniform_sampling(polydata1, SAMPLE_POINTS_, *_CAD_cloud);
73 
74  return 0;
75 }

77 int CADToPointCloud::MeshToROSPointCloud(pcl::PolygonMesh::Ptr mesh)
78 {
79  pcl_conversions::fromPCL(mesh->cloud, _CAD_cloud_msg);
80  _CAD_cloud_msg.header.frame_id = Utils::_frame_id;
81  _CAD_cloud_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
82 
83  return 0;
84 }

128 void CADToPointCloud::uniform_sampling(vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> polydata, size_t n_samples,
129  PointCloudXYZ& cloud_out)
130 {
131  polydata->BuildCells();
132  vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray> cells = polydata->GetPolys();
133 
134  double p1[3], p2[3], p3[3], totalArea = 0;
135  std::vector<double> cumulativeAreas(cells->GetNumberOfCells(), 0);
136  size_t i = 0;
137  vtkIdType npts = 0, *ptIds = NULL;
138  for (cells->InitTraversal(); cells->GetNextCell(npts, ptIds); i++)
139  {
140  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[0], p1);
141  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[1], p2);
142  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[2], p3);
143  totalArea += vtkTriangle::TriangleArea(p1, p2, p3);
144  cumulativeAreas[i] = totalArea;
145  }
146 
147  cloud_out.points.resize(n_samples);
148  cloud_out.width = static_cast<pcl::uint32_t>(n_samples);
149  cloud_out.height = 1;
150 
151  for (i = 0; i < n_samples; i++)
152  {
153  Eigen::Vector4f p;
154  randPSurface(polydata, &cumulativeAreas, totalArea, p);
155  cloud_out.points[i].x = p[0];
156  cloud_out.points[i].y = p[1];
157  cloud_out.points[i].z = p[2];
158  }
159 }
160 
161 void CADToPointCloud::randPSurface(vtkPolyData* polydata, std::vector<double>* cumulativeAreas, double totalArea,
162  Eigen::Vector4f& p)
163 {
164  float r = static_cast<float>(uniform_deviate(rand()) * totalArea);
165 
166  std::vector<double>::iterator low = std::lower_bound(cumulativeAreas->begin(), cumulativeAreas->end(), r);
167  vtkIdType el = vtkIdType(low - cumulativeAreas->begin());
168 
169  double A[3], B[3], C[3];
170  vtkIdType npts = 0;
171  vtkIdType* ptIds = NULL;
172  polydata->GetCellPoints(el, npts, ptIds);
173  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[0], A);
174  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[1], B);
175  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[2], C);
176  randomPointTriangle(float(A[0]), float(A[1]), float(A[2]), float(B[0]), float(B[1]), float(B[2]), float(C[0]),
177  float(C[1]), float(C[2]), p);
178 }
179 
180 double CADToPointCloud::uniform_deviate(int seed)
181 {
182  double ran = seed * (1.0 / (RAND_MAX + 1.0));
183  return ran;
184 }
185 
186 void CADToPointCloud::randomPointTriangle(float a1, float a2, float a3, float b1, float b2, float b3, float c1,
187  float c2, float c3, Eigen::Vector4f& p)
188 {
189  float r1 = static_cast<float>(uniform_deviate(rand()));
190  float r2 = static_cast<float>(uniform_deviate(rand()));
191  float r1sqr = sqrtf(r1);
192  float OneMinR1Sqr = (1 - r1sqr);
193  float OneMinR2 = (1 - r2);
194  a1 *= OneMinR1Sqr;
195  a2 *= OneMinR1Sqr;
196  a3 *= OneMinR1Sqr;
197  b1 *= OneMinR2;
198  b2 *= OneMinR2;
199  b3 *= OneMinR2;
200  c1 = r1sqr * (r2 * c1 + b1) + a1;
201  c2 = r1sqr * (r2 * c2 + b2) + a2;
202  c3 = r1sqr * (r2 * c3 + b3) + a3;
203  p[0] = c1;
204  p[1] = c2;
205  p[2] = c3;
206  p[3] = 0;
207 }
